channel.title: Custom login box?
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how to make a custom login box? I don't mean just change the background sprite I mean change the WHOLE box to how I want.

item.title: Custom login box?
item.dc:creator: @alaska121 alaska121
item.description:
@alaska121 wrote:

ok. i have a question. my source and client are nothing to what i ever seen on mopar scape. i dont know why either but listen please… My sprites folder opens up as a notebook so its all typing and writing. how to i change my sprites if its like that, and i looked it up in the search bar but no results were found. please help me if you can. thanks
